Deemos lunged out of the way of the missile and barely avoided it.

Deemos:=
 Aft?

Airbomber: Enough is enough, Deemos, we're leaving. If you want a ri=
de back, you're going to come right now!

Deemos: I can't just abandon batt=
le, it's not a warriors way.

Airbomber: Since when did you become a warrio=
r, man?...

e: Shockwave & Unitron


  Shockwave/Unitron:




  "Can't I just shoot ONE=
 Maximal?" Unitron asked over comm., two laser bolts 
  digging into an uni=
mportant area in the back of his space fighter mode.  
  "Kiss my aft!" he =
yelled, firing off a missile down towards Deemos.

  Shockwave.  "No, we ar=
e not in a tactical position to do so," he intoned in 
  reply, firing off =
five rapid laser bolts and a missile down at Depp, 
  "continuing with your=
 requests only wastest time and focus."

   

  Your use of Yahoo! Groups i=
